item.title: iPhone 17 Has Another Rumor Reversal
item.description: The base model iPhone 17 will have an A19 chip after all, according to Apple analyst Jeff Pu. A few months ago, Pu said the device would have an A18 chip, but he has now reversed course. “We now expec
